behave.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to do things that are good, bad, sensible etc
behave.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: She behaved in a very responsible way.
I think he behaved disgracefully towards you.
He was a little boy, but he behaved as if he was an adult.
behave.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to not do things that annoy or offend people
behave.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: I hope Nicholas behaved himself at the party.
behave.translation[0].definitions[2].def: if something behaves in a particular way, it does those things
behave.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: Quantum mechanics is the study of the way atoms behave.
behave.translation[0].note_box[0].sectio: behave
to do and say things that are good, bad, normal, strange etc
His teacher said he’d been behaving badly at school.
I’m not going to talk to her until she starts behaving reasonably.
Oh, be quiet! You’re behaving like a two-year-old.
act
to behave in a particular way, especially in a way that seems unusual, surprising, or annoying to other people
Tina’s been acting very strangely lately.
What makes grown people act like that?
treat
to behave towards someone or deal with someone in a particular way
She said that he’d treated her really badly throughout their two-year marriage.
I’m sick of my parents treating me like a child.
conform
to behave in the way that most other people in your group or society behave
Young people sometimes want to rebel and therefore they refuse to conform.
Society typically brings pressure on individuals and groups to conform to civilised norms.
conduct yourself
to behave in a particular way, especially in a situation where people will notice and judge the way you behave
Public figures have a duty to conduct themselves responsibly, even in their private lives.
By the end of the course, you should be able to conduct yourself with confidence in any meeting.
behave.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to act or to do something in a particular way
behave.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Both gold and oil prices behaved exactly as analysts and investors had been predicting.
